title: NB with SAVING feature
author: lars18th
body_snippet:
Hi @Kvarkas ,

Please, reconsider that point: "this build is not production ready so _options savings are still disabled_".

Without this functionallity it's **impossible** to test it in several _real_ environments. A lot of options can be _only_ tested loading a _large_ configuration. This limitation is therefore a major constraint.

So, please rethink it!

comments.snippet:
I highly support the stance that getting the config save to work should have the highest priority as it's pretty unusable the way it's now (that's also why I'm stuck with 1.77.2-NB). I don't have an issue running unstable software as long as I can work efficiently with it, but being unable to export config changes and having to redo them with an old version of the application is too much of a burden.
